name: Popular Day Hikes: South-Central Okanagan - R
categories: Popular Day Hikes: South-Central Okanagan - R
description: Discover robust vineyards, fruit orchards, desert-like grasslands, rich marshes, ponderosa pine forests, towering cliffs, large lakes, salmon streams, modest peaks and a tremendous diversity of animal and plant life. This guidebook features 35 accessible treks in the Southern Okanagan between the Cascade and Columbia mountain ranges, from Kelowna to Osoyoos. Revised second edition features a fresh design and the most current route updates.
